title: La India Dormida Artesanal
typeOfFood: Lacto, American, Indian, Organic, Juice bar, Mexican, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. A small restaurant surrounded by mountains uses mostly organic and seasonal veggies, fruits and herbs from local farmers in the craft food and drinks served. Vegans please inquire. Has capacity for up to 10 guests. Also available for private functions, classes, meetings, parties and celebrations. Private catering menus are available upon request. Holds a monthly love feast with different themes, such as Asian nights, Caribbean nights, movie nights, and more uplifting get-togethers.
